changes.change: Make iSnake more cute by decreasing app icon size and allow you have more space for iSnake to hunting food ^_^. Now you can double tap again while playing iSnake to stop the game.
Disable grid and remove the snake body gaps, more space for your iSnake to hunt the food ^_^
Fix snake alignment issue due to conflict with other tweaks.
Enhance not show alert when can't find page control.
Fix iOS 13 crashing due to currentPageIndex return not correct number
Fix iOS 13 not using SBRootIconListView but using SBIconListView
